explanation: [0-0] The scene shows three cartoon characters. On the left cliff stands Tang San in blue clothes, beside him a luxurious house with gold, silver, and jewels. On the right cliff stands Xiao Wu in white clothes and pink pants, next to her a tiled house. In the middle, Tang Wutong stands on a white platform lift, wearing a white and pink dress.
[0-5] Tang Wutong looks up at the two people above, then Xiao Wu takes out a banknote and throws it down, the platform begins to rise.

[5-14] Then Xiao Wu knocks on the tiled house beside her, turning it into a bag of money and throws it down. Tang Wutong on the platform starts to ascend, surpassing the height of the two standing on the cliff. Above them appears a school, a deep red road leads straight to it, surrounded by flowers, grass, and trees.
